name: My One Long Life
description:
This is the Story of Buddy, a Labrador. He had a great connection with his owner, but because of illness, his owner died and he was left alone in the world. Buddy's Life only rule was to keep his owner happy and have fun with him, but when he's gone he doesn't have anything left in his life.

Come and see what does life means by the point of view of dog.
